originalConfiguration.amplify.yml:
version: 1
frontend:
  phases:
    preBuild:
      commands:
        - npm ci
        - export NEXT_PUBLIC_SITE_URL=$AMPLIFY_APP_URL
        - export NODE_ENV=production
    build:
      commands:
        - npm run build
        - cp -r .next/static out/_next/static 2>/dev/null || true
        - cp -r .next/server out/.next/server 2>/dev/null || true
        - echo '{"version":3,"routes":[],"images":{},"overrides":{},"wildcard":[{"domain":"*","value":"/index.html"}]}' > out/required-server-files.json
        - echo '{}' > out/routes-manifest.json
        - echo '{}' > out/prerender-manifest.json
        - echo "static-build" > out/trace
  artifacts:
    baseDirectory: out
    files:
      - "**/*"
  cache:
    paths:
      - node_modules/**/*
originalConfiguration.amplify-simple.yml:
version: 1
frontend:
  phases:
    preBuild:
      commands:
        - echo "ðŸš€ Starting deployment..."
        - echo "ðŸ“¦ Installing dependencies..."
        - npm ci || npm install
        - export NEXT_PUBLIC_SITE_URL=$AMPLIFY_APP_URL
        - export NODE_ENV=production
        - export DISABLE_AMPLIFY_NEXT_SSR=true
        - echo "âœ… Ready to build"
    build:
      commands:
        - echo "ðŸ”¨ Building static site..."
        - npm run build
        - echo "ðŸ“ Verifying static export..."
        - ls -la out/
        - echo "âœ… Static build complete"
    postBuild:
      commands:
        - echo "ðŸ“ Checking output..."
        - ls -la out/
        - echo "ðŸ”§ Creating required files for static deployment..."
        - echo '{"version":3,"routes":[],"images":{},"overrides":{},"wildcard":[{"domain":"*","value":"/index.html"}]}' > out/required-server-files.json
        - echo "ðŸ”§ Copying trace files to prevent SSR detection..."
        - cp -r .next/server out/.next/ 2>/dev/null || echo "No server files to copy (expected for static export)"
        - echo "âœ… Static deployment files ready"
        - echo "ðŸŽ‰ Ready for deployment"
  artifacts:
    baseDirectory: out
    files:
      - "**/*"
  cache:
    paths:
      - node_modules/**/*
      - .next/cache/**/*
originalConfiguration.amplify-minimal.yml:
version: 1
frontend:
  phases:
    preBuild:
      commands:
        - npm ci
        - export NEXT_PUBLIC_SITE_URL=$AMPLIFY_APP_URL
        - export NODE_ENV=production
    build:
      commands:
        - npm run build
    postBuild:
      commands:
        - echo "Build completed"
        - ls -la out/
  artifacts:
    baseDirectory: out
    files:
      - "**/*"
  cache:
    paths:
      - node_modules/**/*
      - .next/cache/**/*
originalConfiguration.amplify-static.yml:
version: 1
frontend:
  phases:
    preBuild:
      commands:
        - npm ci
        - export NEXT_PUBLIC_SITE_URL=$AMPLIFY_APP_URL
        - export NODE_ENV=production
    build:
      commands:
        - npm run build
  artifacts:
    baseDirectory: out
    files:
      - "**/*"
  cache:
    paths:
      - node_modules/**/*
originalConfiguration..env.production:
# Production Environment Configuration
# This file contains production environment variables for AWS Amplify deployment
# Copy these variables to AWS Amplify Console > Environment Variables

# Site Configuration - UPDATE THESE WITH YOUR ACTUAL VALUES
NEXT_PUBLIC_SITE_URL=https://your-production-domain.com
NEXT_PUBLIC_SITE_NAME=Your Marketing Website
NEXT_PUBLIC_SITE_DESCRIPTION=Mobile-first marketing website showcasing photography, analytics, and ad campaign services

# Analytics and Tracking - ADD YOUR ACTUAL IDs
NEXT_PUBLIC_GA_ID=G-XXXXXXXXXX
NEXT_PUBLIC_FACEBOOK_PIXEL_ID=
NEXT_PUBLIC_HOTJAR_ID=
NEXT_PUBLIC_GTM_ID=GTM-XXXXXXX

# Contact Form Configuration - UPDATE WITH YOUR EMAIL
CONTACT_EMAIL=contact@your-production-domain.com
SMTP_HOST=smtp.gmail.com
SMTP_PORT=587
SMTP_USER=your-smtp-username
SMTP_PASS=your-smtp-password
SMTP_SECURE=true

# Social Media Links - UPDATE WITH YOUR ACTUAL SOCIAL MEDIA URLs
NEXT_PUBLIC_FACEBOOK_URL=https://facebook.com/yourpage
NEXT_PUBLIC_TWITTER_URL=https://twitter.com/yourhandle
NEXT_PUBLIC_LINKEDIN_URL=https://linkedin.com/company/yourcompany
NEXT_PUBLIC_INSTAGRAM_URL=https://instagram.com/yourhandle

# AWS Amplify Configuration (automatically set by Amplify)
AMPLIFY_BRANCH=main
AMPLIFY_APP_ID=
AWS_REGION=us-east-1

# Build Configuration
NODE_ENV=production
NEXT_TELEMETRY_DISABLED=1
NODE_OPTIONS=--max-old-space-size=4096

# Performance and Optimization
ANALYZE=false
NEXT_PUBLIC_ENABLE_ANALYTICS=true
NEXT_PUBLIC_ENABLE_PERFORMANCE_MONITORING=true

# Content Management
CONTENT_VALIDATION_STRICT=true
GENERATE_SITEMAP=true

# Security
NEXT_PUBLIC_CSP_NONCE=
RATE_LIMIT_MAX=100
RATE_LIMIT_WINDOW=900000
originalConfiguration..env.local:
# Site Configuration
NEXT_PUBLIC_SITE_URL=http://localhost:3000
NEXT_PUBLIC_SITE_NAME=Marketing Website - Local Dev
NEXT_PUBLIC_SITE_DESCRIPTION=Mobile-first marketing website showcasing photography, analytics, and ad campaign services

# Analytics and Tracking
NEXT_PUBLIC_GA_ID=G-XXXXXXXXXX
NEXT_PUBLIC_FACEBOOK_PIXEL_ID=
NEXT_PUBLIC_HOTJAR_ID=
NEXT_PUBLIC_GTM_ID=GTM-XXXXXXX

# Contact Form Configuration
CONTACT_EMAIL=dev@localhost.com
SMTP_HOST=smtp.gmail.com
SMTP_PORT=587
SMTP_USER=
SMTP_PASS=
SMTP_SECURE=true

# Social Media Links
NEXT_PUBLIC_FACEBOOK_URL=https://facebook.com/yourpage
NEXT_PUBLIC_TWITTER_URL=https://twitter.com/yourhandle
NEXT_PUBLIC_LINKEDIN_URL=https://linkedin.com/company/yourcompany
NEXT_PUBLIC_INSTAGRAM_URL=https://instagram.com/yourhandle

# AWS Amplify Configuration (automatically set by Amplify)
AMPLIFY_BRANCH=main
AMPLIFY_APP_ID=
AWS_REGION=us-east-1

# Build Configuration
NODE_ENV=development
NEXT_TELEMETRY_DISABLED=1
NODE_OPTIONS=--max-old-space-size=4096

# Performance and Optimization
ANALYZE=false
NEXT_PUBLIC_ENABLE_ANALYTICS=false
NEXT_PUBLIC_ENABLE_PERFORMANCE_MONITORING=true

# Content Management
CONTENT_VALIDATION_STRICT=true
GENERATE_SITEMAP=true

# Security
NEXT_PUBLIC_CSP_NONCE=
RATE_LIMIT_MAX=100
RATE_LIMIT_WINDOW=900000

environmentVariables.NEXT_PUBLIC_SITE_DESCRIPTION: Mobile-first marketing website showcasing photography, analytics, and ad campaign services
